title: Squared Free

verbs: To free; to release from restraint or bondage; to set at liberty; to manumit; to disengage.
To give freedom; to release from confinement or restraint.
To free or liberate; to set free.
Grant freedom to; free from confinement
nouns: A perceptible indication of something not immediately apparent (as a visible clue that something has happened)
A perceptible indication of something not immediately apparent, as a visible clue that something has happened.

apple_vendor_description: The 'FREE' button on Apple devices presents a vibrant, slightly convex rectangle with a bright, almost luminous white background.  Bold, sans-serif lettering in a deep blue clearly spells out 'FREE', enhanced by Apple's signature soft, rounded edges and subtle 3D shading that suggests it's ready to be pressed.  This emoji is commonly used to signify a special offer, a complimentary item, or something available without cost in online shopping or promotional messages on Apple devices.
